LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_BreachAxe.label: tua
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_BreachAxe.description: Is féidir an tua seo a úsáid chun daoine a ionsú, ach b'fhearr duit é a úsáid chun ballaí agus doirse a leagan.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_BreachAxe.tools.handle.label: hanla
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_BreachAxe.tools.head.label: ceann
